channel.title: Why VPSLAND
channel.description:
Well I decided to chose VPSland for my VPS (a mistake I know), but i'm not good with linux and they are the only ones I found with Windows VPS for a decent price.
Been 29 hours and it still isn't up... :eek:
Opinions on VPSLand?

item.title: Why VPSLAND
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“P A N I C, post:11, topic:395720”][quote author=Zoft™ link=topic=492914.msg3603993#msg3603993 date=1305918836]
Wow listen to this shit…

[quote]Hello,

Your order has been deleted by our Anti-Fraud System and your payment has been refunded. Please note that sometimes it may take 3 to 5 business days for the refund to reflect in your account. Please note that email address you have used to place order must be same as your paypal account. I would request you to please place the new order with correct and complete contact information on our online order form. After placing the order please update our billing, we will then expedite the order.

Please let me know if there is anything else I can help you with.

Thanks,

Gary
VPSLAND.com Support[/quote]

I really can’t use my RSPS e-mail? Wow.
[/quote]
LOL!!!11
they also don’t host on port 43594[/quote]

Not true.

Read full topic

item.title: Why VPSLAND
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

VPSLAND isn’t a “bad” company, they just don’t have near the man power to set up the servers and such as they need. It seems sometimes like the whole company run by a twelve year old. Just pay the extra 5$ a month and get kickassvps

Read full topic

item.title: Why VPSLAND
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Try waiting a little longer or contact them

Read full topic

item.title: Why VPSLAND
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Rash, post:4, topic:395720”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=492914.msg3603641#msg3603641 date=1305858820]
When I use to use them, I did not have a single problem with them. I don’t know what’s changed about them and hosting but that sucks for people whom have been using them now.
[/quote]

I still use them.

I order VPS’s from them on a weekly basis, they are great.[/quote]
I suppose VPSLAND has some servers that are bad and some good depending on which one is used and the timing some purchases one. I’ve never had a problem with them, I was satisfied with the RAM and stuff, I loved their services. Honestly, I don’t know what people are complaining about.

Read full topic

item.description:
